description:

Welcome to 109 W Wildey St #PH07! The Schoolhouse Lofts are a community of modern-industrial artist lofts inside the historic Daniel Boone School in the Northern Liberties area of Philadelphia. This beautiful, late gothic revival building was classically known as the Philadelphia school for the rebellious. This building brings a unique mix of old and new with trendy design elements like minimalistic lighting fixtures, exposed beams, original brick work, and fantastically intricate original details. Unit #PH07 is a lofted 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment on the top floor of the building. Enter into a hallway that opens into the common area with high ceilings, large windows, hardwood floors, and plenty of space for different living room and dining room layouts. The kitchen is in the center and boasts ample cabinet & prep space, built-in microwave, gas range, and fridge. Directly behind the kitchen is your full bathroom offering tile flooring, a vanity, and a shower / tub combo. Continue past the bathroom to a bonus area which would work well as an office space, den, or workout area. The lofted bedroom is carpeted and has a double-door closet. The building also features a brand new elevator and there are FREE laundry rooms on the 1st floor, 2nd floor, and Penthouse floor. Schedule your tour today!

description: Charming and homey are words synonymous with 8026 Fairview St. This stunning, newly renovated 3 bedroom single home is situated on a double lot in the Holmesburg neighborhood of Philadelphia. A custom 48" white kitchen with quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances and adorning light fixtures will leave you speechless. The main level also holds a laundry room and half bath. An upper level sports 3 spacious bedrooms and a well appointed hallway bath fitted in stylish subway tile and and a claw foot tub. Given the double lot, this property is blessed with a massive fenced-in backyard, perfect for entertaining friends and family, hosting those summer BBQs on the patio. 8026 Fairview has to many upgrades to name, but some of which include new windows, doors, hardware, kitchen, bath and flooring. This immaculate property will not last long in this red hot market.

The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe or Ultimo. Indulge in a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Have ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday. There is so much to do in this area!

title: Lease Takeover - 1br in luxury building minutes from Rittenhouse Park
description:
Lease takeover on a lovely, bright 1 bedroom unit at 1919 Market, a luxury building at the heart of the city. I've loved this apartment the last two years, but unfortunately a job is taking me to another city and I need somebody to take over the lease starting June 1 (though there is some flexibility if you need to be in a little earlier or want to start a little later). The lease is up August 6, 2022 with the option to renew should you want to stay beyond just this summer! The building allows leases on flexible timeframes, so you would be able to renew for just a month or two if you wanted (or go as far as a 2year lease).
The building has a 24/7 doorman, fully equipped gym, lovely communal spaces, a beautiful roof deck with a view of the city, and a heated pool. It's also a pet friendly building, if you have (or want!) any furry friends. There is also an attached garage (for an extra fee) should you want to park a car in the building.
The apartment itself is a large 1br, with a dishwasher, in-unit washer/dryer, central air, and brand new appliances. It's FIOS equipped so your internet is lightning fast. The unit faces south so it has very good light all day.
Please reach out if you have any questions, or want to see the apartment in person or over Zoom! Seriously it's been a great building and apartment to live in and I would never be moving if I didn't have to for work.

title: Unique lofts in Spring City Chester county
description:
This iconic Church building has been carefully repurposed while keeping true to its historical heritage and detail. Conveniently located in Spring City within walking distance of Main St., a 2 minute drive to Royersford Main st., 7-10 minutes to Rt 422, 10-12 minutes to Phoenixville and Kimberton. This 1 Bedroom Apartment is full of charm and unique character. You walk to your unit through a separate stairwell from the rear parking lot and common porch (which is available for your use). This unit has the original Tin ceilings (we kept the distressed look)with extra wide Crown Moldings. As you enter your unit you walk into a kitchen and sit in dining area. The kitchen comes equipped with elegant custom cabinets (soft close cabinets and drawers) graced with a gorgeous black granite countertop, range, refrigerator, microwave, and deep stainless steel sink. There is a full size washer/dryer in the hallway. The appliances were selected in an understated ultra white to not take away from the beautiful space. The bathroom is tastefully done and includes a shower/tub combination and high end vanity and medicine cabinet. All drawers and doors have soft close hinges. A continuous draw fan will ensure a dry hygienic environment for you. Heating and Air-conditioning is through high-efficiency Fujitsu mini-split units. As you walk up the stairs to your loft style bedroom, you go past a beautiful stained glass window. The bedroom is very large with 2 large closets and a ceiling fan. The ceiling is the original tin ceiling with a distressed look.
Below the stairwell is a full height space by the stained glass window that provides an amazing reading nook or office.
Your safety is important to us. We have installed cameras around the property and are fully covered by fire sprinklers and monitored smoke detectors. Given the extraordinary demand for this property we will have very limited showings. OTHER: Tenant pays for Electricity and Water. This is strictly a NON-SMOKING building. We are pet friendly. Pet rent and deposits based on pet size and type. $50 sewer, trash, maintenance per month. $75 high speed internet optional. 1 parking spot provided in parking lot + street parking. May 15 move in.

description:
Stay in a furnished luxury one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 11th floor in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! The renovated kitchen is fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. Savor a cup of coffee, tea, or cocoa at the breakfast bar every morning. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. A must see, this home is beautiful with its wood floors and high-end furniture!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to stay in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores, restaurants, coffee shops, and bakeries! Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, and Di Bruno Bros. are grocery stores within walking distance! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Anthropologie, Barnes & Noble, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., L'Occitane, Boyds, and Sephora. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Devon Seafood Grill, Parc, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Alice Pizza, and Marathon Grill. Sip a coffee at Ultimo, La Colombe, Elixr, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Pick up a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Grab a scone at Metropolitan Bakery.
